name: Hole Monsters
description:
Hole Monsters

 // Game submission for Brackey's jam 2020.1. //
Theme: Holes.

Controls: 

Move: [WASD]
Aim and Shoot: [Mouse]
flashlight : [F]
action: [E]
pause: [Escape]

Description:
Do not Lost in the Dark. Collect battery cells and grenades and use them to Survive the Hole attack. Find the solutions . And sometimes just jump in to a pretty hole!

!!SPOILER: N-o-E-x-I-t!!

(Trypophobia Alert!)

--------------------------

Sounds from Freesound.org:  by julius_galla.

Assets  from Unity Asset Store. 

Levels created in ProBuilder.

Somethings made by me.

Thank you!
